content: copilot is a textured rhythm-driven sock pattern that evokes movement and flight through dynamic stitch interplay bold graphic motifs trace pathways up the leg creating visual energy that feels both adventurous and wearable designed for knitters who enjoy expressive accessories with distinctive detail copilot balances striking texture with everyday comfort the construction supports a smooth knitting rhythm making this pattern engaging without being overwhelming both charted and written instructions are included for clarity and choice whether you re knitting for yourself or as a thoughtful handmade gift copilot socks bring a sense of momentum and character to every step **sizes** finished circumference unstretched s 18 cm / 7 m 20 cm / 8 l 22 cm / 8 75 xl 24 cm / 9 5 materials yarn dk weight sock yarn approx 80 120g depending on size needles 3 5 3 75 mm us 4 5 dpns or circulars for magic loop notions stitch markers cable needle tapestry needle scissors gauge 24 sts & 32 row = 10 cm 4 in stockinette stitch worked in the round
